extendedInfo.description: Bright Flashlight! Turns your phone into a bright flashlight.Ideal to find objects in dark places, read in bed, or signal others in the dark.On flashlight mode, you can touch the screen to go through different levels of brightness.It also features a red or green strobe light. Access the menu and select Green or Red strobe! Great for dance parties !Another feature is a sleep timer. You can set it as a reading light and fall asleep comfortably knowing that it will turn itself off after an hour and not drain your phones battery. Just select the timer option from the menu.
